definitions.definition: a small European plant of the pea family with yellow flowers and three-lobed cloverlike leaves.
a plant with three-lobed leaves similar to trefoil.
an ornamental design of three rounded lobes like a clover leaf, used typically in architectural tracery.
a thing having three parts; a set of three.
examples: a trefoil of parachutes lowers the shuttle's used rockets to Earth

definitions.definition: denoting something shaped in the form of a trefoil leaf.
